LOADING_DATA: Data is being collected and analyzed...
RAIN_CONTINUING: Precipitation is currently ongoing and will last for about **{duration} minutes**.
RAIN_STARTING: Precipitation will start in **{start} minutes** and last for **{duration} minutes**.
NO_RAIN_EXPECTED: No precipitation expected for the next hour.
GENERIC_ERROR: An error occurred! Please check the city name and ensure API limits are not exceeded.
NO_PERMISSION: You do not have sufficient permissions to use this command! (Required Level: {level})
COMMAND_ERROR: An error occurred while executing the command.
SETTINGS_DESC: You can change Visually's settings for this server here.
PREFIX_MISSING: Please enter a new prefix. (e.g., !settings prefix .)
PREFIX_TOO_LONG: Prefix can be at most 3 characters.
HELP_DESC: Listed below are the commands you can use. Type `{prefix}command` for details.
CMD_DESC_WEATHER: Shows detailed weather information for a specified city.
CMD_DESC_SETTINGS: Changes bot settings (language, prefix) for the server.
CMD_DESC_HELP: Lists available commands and their descriptions.
CMD_DESC_DUEL: It allows you to have a 1v1 battle with whoever you want.
DUEL_QUE_FAIL: It's not your turn! Wait for your opponent.
NO_MANA_ULTRA: Not enough Mana! You need **100 Mana** for Ultra Power.
DUEL_SPECIAL_FAIL: **{target}** tried Ultra Power but failed to focus!
NO_MANA_HEAL: Not enough Mana! You need **40 Mana** to heal.
DUEL_HEAL: **{target}** used a potion and restored **{heal}** HP.
DUEL_NOT_FOR_YOU: This request is not for you!
DUEL_MENTION_FAIL: Please mention a user or provide an ID to duel.
DAILY_COOLDOWN: ‚è≥ You already claimed your daily reward! Come back in **{hours}h {minutes}m**.
CMD_DESC_LEADERBOARD: See the strongest fighters of the server.
LEADERBOARD_EMPTY: üì≠ No data in this category yet.
ONLY_GUILD_ERROR: This feature only works in servers.
ONLY_AUTHOR_CAN_USE: Only the command author can use this menu!
CMD_DESC_KICK: Kicks a user from the server.
KICK_NO_USER: ‚ö†Ô∏è Please specify a user to kick.
KICK_FAIL: ‚ùå Could not kick the user. Check my permissions.
CMD_DESC_BAN: Bans a user from the server.
BAN_NO_USER: ‚ö†Ô∏è Please specify a user to ban.
BAN_FAIL: ‚ùå Could not ban the user. Check my permissions or role hierarchy.
CLEAR_INVALID: ‚ö†Ô∏è Please enter a number between 1 and 100.
CLEAR_FAIL: ‚ùå An error occurred (Messages might be older than 14 days).
UNBAN_INVALID_ID: ‚ö†Ô∏è Please enter a valid User ID (Numbers only).
UNBAN_FAIL: ‚ùå Could not unban. User might not be banned or ID is invalid.
CMD_DESC_MUTE: Times out a user for a duration.
MUTE_NO_USER: ‚ö†Ô∏è Please specify a user to mute.
MUTE_TOO_LONG: ‚ö†Ô∏è Duration too long! Max limit is 28 days.
MUTE_FAIL: ‚ùå Failed to mute. Check my permissions or role hierarchy.
CMD_DESC_UNMUTE: Removes the timeout from a user.
UNMUTE_NO_USER: ‚ö†Ô∏è Please specify a user to unmute.
CMD_DESC_AUTOROLE: Automatically assigns a role to new members.
SLASH_ONLY: ‚ö†Ô∏è This command can only be used via Slash Commands (/).
WELCOME_USAGE_ERROR: ‚ö†Ô∏è Invalid usage! Example: `!welcome welcome #channel` or `!welcome goodbye #channel`
WELCOME_INVALID_CHANNEL: ‚ö†Ô∏è Invalid channel! Please mention a valid text channel.
CMD_DESC_STATS: Shows technical data of the bot.
INVITE_DESC: Use the buttons below to invite me or join our support server.
CMD_DESC_SAY: Makes the bot say a message.
SAY_NO_TEXT: ‚ö†Ô∏è Please enter a message to say.
SAY_RESTRICTED: üõ°Ô∏è For security reasons, you cannot make the bot mention `@everyone` or `@here`!
WARN_INVALID_USAGE: ‚ö†Ô∏è Invalid usage! Use `/warn add`, `/warn list` or `/warn delete`.
WARN_FAIL_SELF: ‚ö†Ô∏è You cannot warn yourself or the bot!
WARN_NO_ID: ‚ö†Ô∏è Please specify the warning ID to delete (e.g. `A7X2`).
WARN_NOT_FOUND: ‚ùå No warning found with this ID.
WARN_DELETED: üóëÔ∏è Warning with ID `{id}` has been deleted.
HELP_MAIN_TEXT:
Hello! I am **Visually**. An advanced entertainment and moderation bot.

Use the menu below to explore my commands.

‚ùì **Support:** Use `/invite` to join our support server.
NOT_YOUR_MENU: Only the command author can use this menu!
CAT_MOD_DESC: Admin commands to manage the server.
CAT_SYS_DESC: Configure bot settings for the server.
AI_ERROR: My brain is a little fried right now... Can you try again later?
CMD_DESC_SLANG: Enables or disables the bot's slang/casual mode.
INVALID_SLANG_ARG: ‚ùå Please provide a valid option: `on` or `off`.
SLANG_ENABLED: üòé **Slang Mode Enabled!** I'll be more casual, chill, and use some slang now.
SLANG_DISABLED: üßê **Slang Mode Disabled.** I will now speak formally and politely.
